Subject: Building a Vuetiful Web Application With Vue and Vuetify
Description: This event will be an introduction into web development using the Vue.js javascript framework. Attendees will be guided through the process of creating a functional web application. We will use Vue.js together with Vuetify, a library of pre-styled components, to build put together a frontend display for the application. All of the setup code will be provided as a Codepen, as well as the finished result to compare against.  Speakers include:Brandon Lyons - Track: Tech  - Duration: 1 hour
